exclusion: Put the controller into exclusion mode, then push the middle button on the smart plug 3-5 times within 3 seconds
inclusion: Put the controller into inclusion mode, then push the middle button on the smart plug 3-5 times within 3 seconds
label: NZW39
overview: Z-Wave Plug/Dimmer w/Built-in Z-Wave Repeater, combines a Z-Wave Outlet & Range Extender in 1 Module
usage:
500W Incandescent (1-Gang), 400W Incandescent (2-Gang), 300W Incandescent (3-Gang)

NOTE: If you’d like to disable the white LED light, after you include it to your network, hold down the Manual Button (A) for 10 seconds (re-enable by holding for 10 seconds).

IMPORTANT: This device defaults back to the state it was in prior to a power outage (ie: if the device was off prior to a power outage, it will remain off when power is restored, and vice versa if the device was on).

Please use your controller to remove the device from your network to factory reset. Only use this if your controller is missing or inoperable.

category.label: Power Outlet
category.description: Small devices to be plugged into a power socket in a wall which stick there

parameters.label: Dimming Step
parameters.description: Percentage of step when switch is dimming up or down (0 = instant)

parameters.label: Minimum Level
parameters.description: Minimum dimming level for attached light

parameters.label: LED Indicator
parameters.description: Turn LED indicator ON when light is ON (paddle switch only)

parameters.label: Invert Switch
parameters.description: Invert on & off on the physical switch

parameters.label: Auto OFF
parameters.description: Automatically turn switch off after this number of seconds

parameters.label: Send command on local action
parameters.description: When should the switch send commands to Group 3 devices?

parameters.label: Send command on 3-way action
parameters.description: When should the switch send commands to Group 3 devices?

parameters.label: Send command on z-wave action
parameters.description: When should the switch send commands to Group 3 devices?

parameters.label: Send command on auto off timer
parameters.description: When should the switch send commands to Group 3 devices?

parameters.label: Association Group 3 setting
parameters.description: Change how devices respond when associated in group 3

parameters.label: Default Level (local)
parameters.description: Default level when light is turned on at the switch (0 = previous level)

parameters.label: Default Level (Z-Wave)
parameters.description: Default level when light is turned on via Z-Wave command (0 = previous level)

associations.label: Group 2
associations.description: Sends on/off commands to associated devices when switch is pressed (BASIC_SET)

associations.label: Group 3
associations.description: Sends dim/brighten commands to associated devices when switch is pressed (SWITCH_MULTILEVEL_SET)
